moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Removes physical and special damage-reducing effects from the opponents’ field of play.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 1
passives.description: Has a small chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
